about_the_game:
Rogue Cube Defense is a minimalist roguelite tower defense game with procedurally generated path that you gradually build up. Each run is different as the upgrades you get from leveling up are random. Pick your towers loadout and come up with the best strategy to beat the hordes of enemies.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED PATH

Every run is different and every path is random. But you have control over which branches in the path to expand.

MANY UPGRADES TO CHOOSE FROM

Upgrades are the driving force; it can either make it or break your defense. Choose wisely.

CUSTOMISE LOADOUT

Choose your towers before starting the defense. You'll be able to unlock more towers as you complete more achievements.

SEVERAL GAME MODES

Different game modes offer different level of challenge (as well as the reward). After all, it's easier to defend one path with no branches than a path with ten.

META PROGRESS

Every run is new, but some experience collected carries through. Use these points for meta upgrades to aid your run.
